name: Dig For Your Life
description:
Thanks for playing our game. Please download the file below. We worked very hard on this game and would love your feedback! Unfortunately we ran into a few bugs trying to make it playable in the browser (working on a fix). 

A virus is spreading in the town... will you survive? 

Kill the zombies and make it out alive!

  • WASD to move
  • Number keys for weapons
  • Mouse click to shoot

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

The theme of the jam was: Holes

Much love, Tarzand & DapeachTV. 

February 16 - February 23 2020, for Brackeys GameJam2020.1

Made in Unity.
